update.description:
Currently all abichecker jobs are hard-coded to xenial, but they fail everytime on gz11 branches:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/

We aren't yet worried about enforcing abi compatibility with gz11, but this generates a lot of extra jenkins email spam even when abi is unaffected.

dsl generation:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=_dsl_ignition&build=683)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_ignition/683/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_ignition/683/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=_dsl_sdformat&build=650)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_sdformat/650/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_sdformat/650/

testing:

* not sure why this failed [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=4)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/4/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/4/
* but this one works [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_common-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=1)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/1/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/1/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=3)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/3/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/3/

pull_request.title: Fix gz11 abi jobs by auto-detecting ubuntu distro

pullrequest.title: Fix gz11 abi jobs by auto-detecting ubuntu distro

content.raw:
I think that the [failing build cause](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/ws/abi_checker/logs/ign-physics/X/log.txt/*view*/) it is related to the use of C\+\+17 features. We lack the logic of gz11 hook and compiler selection in the abi checker generic job for ignition and the problem is that we have it widespread among all ign-\*-compilation scripts. Options I see:

1. Refactor all logic to select gz11 branches, put it in a share place and reuse in -compilations and abicheck scripts.
2. Try to workaround the issue by setting the `export USE_GCC8=true` to be used in all abi-checkers. We could find a non desired side-effect although I think that the chances are low.

I did the second in `abi_gz11_jrivero` branch:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=6)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_physics-abichecker-any\_to\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/6/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/6/))
content.html:
I think that the failing build cause it is related to the use of C++17 features. We lack the logic of gz11 hook and compiler selection in the abi checker generic job for ignition and the problem is that we have it widespread among all ign-*-compilation scripts. Options I see:

  1. Refactor all logic to select gz11 branches, put it in a share place and reuse in -compilations and abicheck scripts.
  2. Try to workaround the issue by setting the export USE_GCC8=true to be used in all abi-checkers. We could find a non desired side-effect although I think that the chances are low.

I did the second in abi_gz11_jrivero branch:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/6/)
